WorkItem.Description:
I wanted to compile NAudio source code in the VS 2008 .NET 3.5 but I've met little problem with code backward compatiblity.
In many files there are references to Linq "using System.Linq;" but most of the files do not need it really. 
All unused references, like this, should be removed.
WorkItem.Summary: too many "using" references, that are not used

Comments.Message: please remove this issue item, it is duplicate of #16129. Sorry for that.
